## WorkflowService.listActivityInstances() method

Gets a list of Activity Instances. This operation returns an instance of 'ActivityInstance' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static listActivityInstances({ forAllUsers, ownerId, assigneeId, activityStates, processDefinitionId, }: {
        forAllUsers?: boolean;
        ownerId?: string;
        assigneeId?: string;
        activityStates?: Array<any>;
        processDefinitionId?: string;
    }): CancelablePromise<Array<ActivityInstance>>;
```
